short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension keeps track of the open tabs and windows you're currently running

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Yet another tab limiter! 

This extension maximizes productivity by keeping tabs (heh) on your open tabs and windows, and letting you limit the number of open tabs. 

Now get to work!
